author: bmanikm
body:
<!-- PR checklist -->
- [X ] Resolves issue #1294, #1296, #1297, #1298.
- [ ] Code is up-to-date with `master`.
- [ ] Add tests that fail without your changes.
- [ ] Update all relevant [documentation](../docs).

<!-- Provide more details about the PR below -->
#1294: Publish-Module, Publish-Script needs to be deactivated on CorePowerShell
#1296: Environment settings for PowerShellGet needs to be made platform agnostic
#1297: Update Test-RunningAsElevated in PowerShellGet to work agnostic to platform
#1298: Deactivate PowerShellGet telemetry on CorePowerShell

comments.author: raghushantha
comments.body:
@bmanikm  Will the same code base work without PowerShell Core i.e PSv4 and above?

This is because we can use one single code base to make Gallery releases for PowerShellGet that works on all platforms

comments.author: bmanikm
comments.body:
@raghushantha Yes, we use the same code base for PS 3 and 4 as well. 
We do full feature validation with the latest code changes for releasing the stand alone MSI for downlevel PS versions and for releasing to the PSGallery.
